manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Performance Period Gear Our 360° FlexFit design expands to fit your body and move with you - so your period can't slow you down.

Protection For Bodies In Motion 360° Triple Layer Protection Our 360° design expands to fit you from all angles with backup layers for added protection. Leak-Trapping Flexfit Technology FlexFit interlocking fibers move with you and quickly trap leaks. Comfortable Contoured Applicator With a slimmed tip and no-slip grip, our contoured applicator is designed for comfortable, precise placement.

Playtex Sport Playtex Sport Odor Shield Playtex Sport Compact Description: 360° SPORT LEVEL PROTECTION designed to fit and adjust to your body with every move for powerful leak protection. 360° SPORT LEVEL PROTECTION Designed with Odor Shield technology to neutralize odors for ultimate freshness. 360° SPORT LEVEL PROTECTION Designed to comfortably fit your active life and fits in the palm of your hand. Technology: Flex Fit interlocking fibers work quickly to trap leaks. Leak Defense Anti-leak back up layer for extra protection Contoured Tip & No-Slip Grip Applicator For comfortable, precise placement. Odor Shield technology neutralizes odors. Up to 2x more odor fighting protection vs. Playtex Sport Flex Fit Leak Defense Anti-leak back up layer for extra protection Contoured Tip & No- Slip Grip Applicator for comfortable, precise placement. Designed with Compact Applicator. Pull and Click into Place. 30% Smaller than full-size tampons *based on length before extension Flex Fit interlocking fibers work quickly to trap leaks. Leak Defense Anti-leak back up layer for extra protection. Absorbency: Regular, Super, Super Plus, Ultra Regular, Super Regular, Super Scent: Unscented Unscented Unscented

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m such a fan of this brand! It’s extremely comfortable. I can always rely on this to get me through that time of the month

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I use them for nose bleeds
reviews.reviewText: I get more nose bleeds then most people. these tampons do the trick for stopping the blood flow quick, could not tell you how well they work on the red river flowing sorry

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great I was just too lazy to go to the store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only tampons I'll use. Period.
reviews.reviewText: In my decades of tampon use, Playtex Sport are my clear favorites. In fact, they're the only ones I'll use. The shape makes insertion (I know, ick factor) easy and as comfortable as the process could possibly be, the curve/grip means the plastic never slips or gets lost (ick again), and the tampon is easy to remove from the rapper then re-wrapped once inserted. The cotton portion itself is true to size (meaning Super actually works for a "super" day 1 or 2 and regular works as expected for day 3 and 4 -- for me. I've never used the other sizes.) And I've never had an issue with leakage.Packaging seems to change a lot, so definitely pay attention (sometimes the wording is fragrance-free, sometimes unscented, which is what I want... so look closely.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works very well for heavy flow days
reviews.reviewText: Switched to these from the kotex click. I miss the compact nature of the others but it isn't a deal breaker. These are much more absorbent than the kotex ones. I like them much better for when I have heavier flow. Leak way less than the kotex ones. Also I read something about kotex being sued for theirs shedding inside and causing issues... *TMI incoming* I do still experience sometimes where the absorbance leaves something to be desired. If you're towards the end of your period or your flow is less liquid and more like arousal texture, it seems to resist being absorbed and work it's way around the tampon instead.I recently bled an entire month (thanks birth control) and switched instead to a menstrual cup. These were just a little to absorbent for what I had going on. It also sucked to monitor how long each tampon had been in. Usually for a week it's fine, but doing it every day for a full month became exhausting. I also have a sleep disorder and sleep ~9.5 hours a night which rules out using tampons unless I wake up in the middle of the night (which again, sleep disorder, not gonna happen, lol) I also switched because I saw how much waste I'd generated over those 4 weeks.I do normally have a VERY heavy period from day 2-5 though, which is too much for the cups I have (diva and salt soft, saalt soft is way better) so I use tampons during the day on those days. They're easier to switch as needed at work. So I'd suggest considering a combination of tampons and a cup personally.Overall, good product. Better than kotex, but that's the only other tampon brand I've used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2022
reviews.reviewText: These tampons are great. I have no complaints. One more can I really say they’re tampons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2019
reviews.reviewText: What can you say about tampons? OK.. these have been my favorite for as long as they have been on the market. Very absorbent. I love the plastic applicator because it is larger and finger grip is ribbed which is great for plus size women as well. Yay, we have something to hold on to. We all have to hate when inserting doesn't work out right but with these there haven't been any issues. The price was great for a 50 count box and I believe they came the very next day. Enough about tampons, makes my life easier and so I highly recommend and will continue purchasing via Amazon.

Ich kenne diese Tampons aus dem Ausland und war total begeistert. Da es sie in Deutschland nicht im Laden gibt, habe ich sie super teuer über Amazon bestellt. Hinzu kam Zoll von über 10 Euro, was im Moment der Bestellung nicht klar war.Wenn das nicht schon ärgerlich genug wäre, die Qualität ist schlechter als ich es gewohnt war. Normalerweise gehen die Tampons wie eine Blume auf. Aber diese bleiben einfach ein Klumpen und rutschen dann. Ich bin total enttäuscht und genervt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 30, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Got here quick! Best product ever!

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect product and happy with the seller
reviews.reviewText: This is the one that I am using from past 5 years and can't even think of trying anything else , easy to use and very comfortable. The seller is very professional, they called me and told that this item might get delayed but they are great because they managed to dispatched it on time , so I am happy 😊

The product is good. All the complaints are people probably not using the product correctly, poor mis-judged their flow and required item to obsorb the fluids.Overall, I do prefer purchasing in store because I like picking it out, but online is great if you can't leave the house.

Originally I discovered these tampons years ago, and I have used them exclusively since. They work perfectly for me. Extremely easy to insert, and I don't have the issue of the tampons leaking as some of the other reviews are having. I highly recommend trying these, they might not be for everyone, but they might be for you!
